title: Madeline and the treasure hunt. Madeline and the mummy.
brief_description: When a newspaper sponsers a treasure hunt, Madeline and her friends decide to look for the chest of money. On the way, they help many people and though they don’t get the treasure are well rewarded for their kind acts in “Madeline and the treasure hunt.” Madeline and her friends visit Egypt and are cursed with bad luck by a mummy they encounter. However Madeline discovers the Mummy’s secret in “Madeline and the mummy” and saves the day.
